title: [CY] Your appeal will be decided by an independent tribunal
reviewed: [CY] Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a {{tribunalPanel}}. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision on your entitlement to the {{benefitType}} benefit.
separate: [CY] The tribunal are separate from DWP.
UCreviewed: [CY] Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a judge and for some appeals, a doctor. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision.
